item.description:
Sticky 10 is a fun card game that can be played with 2-8 players.

Players will try different strategies to win the game while trying to get rid of Sticky 10 cards that cannot be played.

Setup


 Players pick one random card from color cards. All players take one Sticky 10 card to their hand. Keep remaining Sticky 10 cards out of the game


For 2 players game, add 2 extra Sticky 10 card into the deck and mix it

For 3 players game, add 1 extra Sticky 10 card into the deck and mix it


 There are 4 Terminator cards in the game. But, in the games played up to with 4 players, only 2 Terminator cards are added into the deck whereas 4 Terminator cards are added into the deck in the games 5-8 players. Keep remaining Terminator cards out of the game
 All players are distributed 9 cards. Thus players shall have 10 cards at the beginning of the game, including Sticky 10 card.
 The deck is put on the table face down. A card is opened from the top. The game begins!


Note: If the card opened from the top is a Special card or Sticky 10 card, players may begin to play by throwing any card with any color to the table.

How to play?


 The youngest player begins to play first and the sequence continues by counter clock wise. Each player can play only one card on their turn.
 Each player can play only one card on their turn.
 The player who shall begin to play, plays according to the open card on the table.


For instance: There is "red 2" card on the table. The player who should play can do one of the following moves;


 Plays with any red; it is going to be the next player's turn to play. In such a case, color shall be deemed to have remained same.



 Plays any card which matches with any number and color on the table; he/she gives to the next player any two cards from his/her hand and it is going to be next player's turn to play. In such a case, color shall be deemed to have remained same.


• Plays any card which matches with the number on the table; he/she gives to the next player any one card from his/her hand and it is going to be next player's turn to play. In such a case, color shall be deemed to have changed. Next player should throw a card according to the new color. You can also throw different color but same number or Special card.

• Plays any Special cards; card's feature shall be active and it is either going to be the next player's turn to play according to the card thrown, or not. In such a case, the player who should play shall determine the color by the card he is going to throw.

Note: If you can not throw any card, draw a new card from deck. If you still can not throw any card, your turn ends.

The player who removed his cards first from his hand shall be deemed to have won.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
